name: That Way!
description:
That Way! is a platformer about planning your path to reach a series of guarded vaults. For each vault, create a list of commands that will help your partner reach it. When you are ready, send them to him one by one to get him there.

You will navigate through 50 levels, each containing more hazards than the last. Plan carefully and watch your timing to ensure your victory!

Controls


  • Shift: Switch between "Plan" and "Run" modes
  • Ctrl/Command + Arrows: Pan Camera
  • Esc: Pause

Plan Mode Controls

  • WASD: Add new command
  • Up/Down Arrows: Scroll through commands

Run Mode Controls

  • Enter: Send command
